ygData.subject: Re: Lake Rathe question JB?
ygData.msgSnippet: well, ya, but here is what i did- i used jonah to finish off L15, got my pet spell, and started soloing aviak guards.  with the L16 pet you should be able to
ygData.messageBody:
well, ya, but here is what i did- i used jonah to finish off L15, got my pet
spell, and started soloing aviak guards. with the L16 pet you should be
able to solo a guard almost all the time if you dont mess up, even a lot of
the reds, altho its risky because you dont know exactly how far above you
the red is. as you get higher you should be able to easily kill one. at
L20 you can pretty easily kill two (even at once, altho its not easy. at
L23 i still dont like doing it, but its the only way to stagger the spawn).

also, the lake is a great place to cap dodge when you reach L22- you can
solo a guard, w/o a pet, at that lvl. i took the opportunity so i could cap
my defense skill too; i capped my piercing and offense, but pretty soon they
wont be used. oh well, i use em now anyway.

Belphenor Varacoloci

>From: "Skel" <mata_eq@...>
>
>Cool, and if I am 16th lvl I should be ok for JB?
